GSC COIN BLOCKCHAIN WALLET - STANDALONE EXECUTABLE
==================================================

File: gscvags.exe
Size: 46.4 MB
Version: 1.0
Built: January 2026

WHAT IS GSC COIN?
-----------------
GSC Coin is a complete Bitcoin-like blockchain cryptocurrency with:
‚úÖ Full blockchain from Genesis Block
‚úÖ Bitcoin-like transaction system with 8-step flow
‚úÖ Automatic peer-to-peer broadcasting
‚úÖ Mining with Proof-of-Work consensus
‚úÖ Wallet management with QR codes
‚úÖ Blockchain import/export (JSON format)
‚úÖ RPC server for external integrations
‚úÖ Real-time mempool and network monitoring

FEATURES INCLUDED:
------------------
üîÑ Complete Bitcoin Transaction Flow:
   1. User Initiates Transaction
   2. Broadcast to Network
   3. Mempool Management
   4. Miner Selection (high-fee priority)
   5. Block Creation
   6. Block Broadcast
   7. Network Verification
   8. Transaction Confirmation

üåê P2P Networking:
   - Automatic peer discovery
   - Real-time transaction broadcasting
   - Shared mempool synchronization
   - Network status monitoring

‚õèÔ∏è Mining System:
   - Bitcoin-like Proof-of-Work
   - High-fee transaction prioritization
   - Real-time mining visualization
   - Automatic block broadcasting

üì§üì• Blockchain Sharing:
   - Export blockchain as JSON
   - Import blockchain from others
   - Share blockchain data easily

üí∞ Wallet Features:
   - Generate addresses
   - QR code support
   - Balance tracking
   - Transaction history

HOW TO USE:
-----------
1. Double-click "gscvags.exe" to launch
2. The GUI will open automatically
3. Create or open a wallet
4. Start mining to earn GSC coins
5. Send/receive transactions
6. Connect to peers for networking

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
-------------------
- Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
- 4 GB RAM minimum
- 1 GB free disk space
- Internet connection (optional, for P2P networking)

NO INSTALLATION REQUIRED:
-------------------------
This is a standalone executable that includes:
- Python runtime
- All required libraries
- Complete blockchain system
- GUI interface

Simply run the .exe file - no Python installation needed!

SHARING WITH OTHERS:
-------------------
You can share this "gscvags.exe" file with anyone:
- Send via email, cloud storage, or USB
- Recipients can run it immediately
- No additional software required
- All blockchain features included

BLOCKCHAIN DATA:
---------------
- Blockchain data stored locally in JSON files
- Export your blockchain to share with others
- Import blockchain data from other users
- All data portable and shareable

NETWORKING:
----------
- Connects to other GSC Coin nodes automatically
- Transactions broadcast to all connected peers
- Shared mempool across network
- Real-time peer status display

MINING:
-------
- Start mining to earn GSC coins
- Miners select high-fee transactions first
- Real-time hash rate and nonce display
- Automatic block broadcasting to network

SUPPORT:
--------
This is a complete blockchain implementation.
All features are self-contained in this executable.
No external dependencies or services required.

Enjoy using GSC Coin!
